name: vega-visual-builder
description: Plataforma visual para criação de gráficos Vega/Vega-Lite compatíveis com Deneb (Power BI)

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
